name: A Healer's Tale
description:
Healers... always needed but rarely appreciated. Your task is to heal a group of less-than-thankful adventurers as they traverse a dungeon. Will you make it through, or will your team running off into danger make you give up healing for good?

Controls:
WASD to move
Left click for healing beam and to select abilities
Right click to use active ability
1-5 to activate abilities from hotbar

You have 5 healing abilities:
1: Health Bomb, heals all allies in an area
2: Healing Zone, places a zone of health which heals over time
3: Heal Self, restores your own health
4: Shield, makes the target take no damage
5: Revive, brings the  target back to life

Made for Ludum Dare 46, Theme: Keep it alive
